phases.name: bnn-1-Ca-H2O
phases.activation: further activated at 373 K to afford bnn-1-Ca

synthesis_conditions.thermal_stability: stable to temperatures up to 363 K
synthesis_conditions.dehydration: Exposure to ambient laboratory conditions (294 K, 53 % RH) over 10 h resulted in regeneration of (bnn-1-Ca-H2O)·H2O

synthesis_conditions.activation: activated under vacuum at 423 K for two hours, with increased activation time to five hours leading to substantial ligand disorder
synthesis_conditions.thermal_stability: stable to temperatures up to 578 K
synthesis_conditions.reversibility: Exposure to ambient air for two weeks nearly reverted to the structure of (bnn-1-Ca-H2O)·H2O
